channel.title: 562 Command Console
channel.description: Hello, Okay so i'm using the CorruptionX source and it lets everyone use the command console :confused: how can I make it not allow this :( just for people with player rights 2

item.title: 562 Command Console
item.dc:creator: @Project_Realm Project Realm
item.description:
@Project_Realm wrote:

That’s client sided coding, as the console is (to the best of my knowledge) completely client based. That’s some heavy duty programming since most 562 clients that I have come across are insanely obfuscated. Also… if you were to open up the console before you login, it works. Why? Again, it’s client based, not server based.

Instead of doing what you want to do, just make sure that anything entered into the console from someone whose rights are not 2 is ignored. This would be server based, and quite simple to implement.

Read full topic
